gen:link.msg:message: `Assets` SHOULD be equal to the summation of the underlying values. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_BalanceSheetPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenDParentDebit1_Assets')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_BalanceSheetPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenDParentDebit1_Assets return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_BalanceSheetPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenDParentDebit1_ChildrenOfAssetsDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_BalanceSheetPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenDParentDebit1_ChildrenOfAssetsDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_BalanceSheetPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenDParentDebit1_ChildrenOfAssetsCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_BalanceSheetPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenDParentDebit1_ChildrenOfAssetsCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
`BalanceSheetBeforeAfterAppropriationResults` SHOULD not exist for any period other than the current period.

`EquityAndLiabilities` SHOULD be equal to + `Assets`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_BalanceSheetPensionFunds_PrtFST101Variable1_EquityAndLiabilities')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_BalanceSheetPensionFunds_PrtFST101Variable1_EquityAndLiabilities return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_BalanceSheetPensionFunds_PrtFST101Variable1_Assets')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_BalanceSheetPensionFunds_PrtFST101Variable1_Assets return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`EquityAndLiabilities` SHOULD be equal to the summation of the underlying values. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_BalanceSheetPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenDParentCredit1_EquityAndLiabilities')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_BalanceSheetPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenDParentCredit1_EquityAndLiabilities return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_BalanceSheetPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenDParentCredit1_ChildrenOfEquityAndLiabilitiesCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_BalanceSheetPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenDParentCredit1_ChildrenOfEquityAndLiabilitiesCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_BalanceSheetPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenDParentCredit1_ChildrenOfEquityAndLiabilitiesDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_BalanceSheetPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenDParentCredit1_ChildrenOfEquityAndLiabilitiesDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`FoundationCapitalAndReserves` SHOULD be equal to the summation of the underlying values. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_BalanceSheetPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenDParentCredit2_FoundationCapitalAndReserves')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_BalanceSheetPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenDParentCredit2_FoundationCapitalAndReserves return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_BalanceSheetPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenDParentCredit2_ChildrenOfFoundationCapitalAndReservesCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_BalanceSheetPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenDParentCredit2_ChildrenOfFoundationCapitalAndReservesCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_BalanceSheetPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenDParentCredit2_ChildrenOfFoundationCapitalAndReservesDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_BalanceSheetPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenDParentCredit2_ChildrenOfFoundationCapitalAndReservesDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
